update sys_file_kind set create_person_id=#{createPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ramarks=#{ramarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_person_id=#{updatePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date=#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_person_name=#{updatePersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_person_name=#{createPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind_name=#{kindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del=#{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other=#{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak1=#{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bak2=#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select id, create_person_id, create_date, ramarks, status, audit_status, update_person_id, update_date, update_person_name, create_person_name, kind_name, parent_id, del, other, bak1, bak2 from sys_file_kind where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and create_person_id like '%${createPersonId}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and ramarks like '%${ramarks}%'
and status = '1'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and update_person_id like '%${updatePersonId}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and update_person_name like '%${updatePersonName}%'
and create_person_name like '%${createPersonName}%'
and kind_name like '%${kindName}%'
and ( parent_id = '${parentId}' or id = '${parentId}')
and del like '%${del}%'
and other like '%${other}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
select id,parent_id as pid,parent_id as parentId,kind_name as name, kind_name as text,id as code,bak1 as nodePath from sys_file_kind where status = 1

select sys_user.user_id as userId,sys_user.user_name as userName,sys_user.user_disp as userDisp, sys_file_kind_auth.user_id as userConfig1 from sys_user left join sys_file_kind_auth on (sys_user.user_id = sys_file_kind_auth.user_id and sys_file_kind_auth.file_kind_id = #{fileKindId}) where sys_user.user_delflag = '0'
and sys_user.user_disp like '%${userName}%'
group by sys_user.user_id
